install.name: Notices Module
install.author: HUBzero
install.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module shows a notice (when site will be down, etc.) box for site visitors.

param.name: start_publishing
param.label: Start Publishing
param.description: The start time the site will be down.

param.name: stop_publishing
param.label: Finish Publishing
param.description: The time the site will be back up.

param.name: alertlevel
param.label: Alert level
param.description: The alert level the notice field will take. Determines color.

param.name: moduleid
param.label: Module ID
param.description: An ID to be applied to the css of the module container, this allows individual module styling

param.name: allowClose
param.label: Allow closing
param.description: Allow the notice to be closed by the user
